title: Pair of Sleeves
description: indigo, red; central embroidered band encircles sleeve:  red, white, yellow, green in key and zig-zag designs; band ends with joined triangles (pointed) of narrow, multicolored embroidered patterns; narrow, 3/4\" band of multicolored embroidery at lower edge of sleeve opening; all bands applied after embroidery
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
